header.title: Calculate the odds in liar's poker card game
header.subtitle: The exact probability of every poker hand assuming a 24-card deck is used.

infoSection1.title: Satisfy your curiosity
infoSection1.content: Have you ever guessed a poker hand correctly and thought "How lucky was I?" Look no further! Check the odds in our calculator instantly.

infoSection2.title: Analyze the poker hands
infoSection2.content: Have you always wondered what the poker hand order should be? Check out our <2>analysis</2>.

infoSection3.title: Learn the rules
infoSection3.content: Not sure how to play liar's poker yet? Go check out the <2>game rules</2>.
